alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 10:35PM AKST until December 08 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to midnight AKST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest accumulations expected on the Haines Highway. The city of Haines will likely see around 2 to 4 inches before warming up enough Wed to start to mix with or change to rain. Accumulations there will be highly dependent on the timing of the warmup.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
